original: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mi rung ngo //
translated: The defilement of the passions, the defilement of action, and the defilement of birth would be impossible.

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba yang mi rung ngo //
translated: Mundane purification and supramundane purification would be impossible.

original: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ji ltar mi rung zhe na /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ji ltar mi rung zhe na /
translated: How is the defilement of the passions impossible?

original: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pas bag chags sa bon nyid du byas pa ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po dag la mi rung ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pas bag chags sa bon nyid du byas pa ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po dag la mi rung ste /
translated: Thus, the latent afflictions and secondary afflictions that are seeds are not in the six collections of consciousness.

original: 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa gang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang dag dang lhan cig skyes shing 'gags pa de nyid la de dag gi sa bon gyi dngos por bag chags bsgos par 'gyur gyi gzhan la ni ma yin no //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa 'gags pa rnam par shes pa gzhan gyis bar du chod pa de la ni bag chags med cing bag chags kyi gnas kyang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa gang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang dag dang lhan cig skyes shing 'gags pa de nyid la de dag gi sa bon gyi dngos por bag chags bsgos par 'gyur gyi gzhan la ni ma yin no // mig gi rnam par shes pa 'gags pa rnam par shes pa gzhan gyis bar du chod pa de la ni bag chags med cing bag chags kyi gnas kyang mi dmigs te /
translated: Thus, the eye consciousness that arises and ceases together with any affliction or secondary affliction such as attachment is imbued with the latent potentialities of those afflictions and secondary afflictions as the entity of their seeds, but not any other consciousness.🔽The eye consciousness that has ceased and is interrupted by another consciousness is not imbued with the latent potentialities and the basis of the latent potentialities is not apprehended.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa sngar 'gags pa ni med pa rnam par shes pa gzhan gyis bar du chod pa yin pas /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa sngar 'gags pa ni med pa rnam par shes pa gzhan gyis bar du chod pa yin pas /
translated: The eye consciousness that has ceased is nonexistent and is interrupted by another consciousness.

original: med pa 'das pa de las 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bcas pa 'byung du mi rung ste /
analyzed: med pa 'das pa de las 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bcas pa 'byung du mi rung ste /
translated: It is not tenable that that which is past and nonexistent can be associated with attachment, etc.

original: 'das pa'i las las rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba bzhin no //
analyzed: 'das pa'i las las rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like the arising of the ripened result from a past action.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags la sogs pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba de la yang bag chags mi rung ngo //🔽re zhig 'dod chags la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags la sogs pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba de la yang bag chags mi rung ngo // re zhig 'dod chags la ni ma yin te /
translated: Also, it is not tenable that the eye consciousness that arises simultaneously with attachment, etc. is imbued with the latent imprints of attachment, etc.

original: 'dod chags ni de la brten pa'i phyir dang / mi brten pa'i phyir ro //🔽rnam par shes pa gzhan dag la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod chags ni de la brten pa'i phyir dang / mi brten pa'i phyir ro // rnam par shes pa gzhan dag la yang ma yin te /
translated: First, attachment is not imbued with attachment because attachment is not supported by attachment and is not without support.

original: rnam par @8b shes pa rnams kyi gnas tha dad pa'i phyir dang / lhan cig 'byung ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro //🔽rang gi dngos po la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par @8b shes pa rnams kyi gnas tha dad pa'i phyir dang / lhan cig 'byung ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro // rang gi dngos po la yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not imbued with other consciousnesses because the bases of the consciousnesses are different and they do not arise and cease simultaneously.

original: rang gi dngos po ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang / 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi dngos po ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang / 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is not imbued with its own nature because its own nature does not arise and cease simultaneously.

original: de lta bas na mig gi rnam par shes pa la 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas bag chags bsgos par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de lta bas na mig gi rnam par shes pa la 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas bag chags bsgos par mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore, it is not possible for the eye consciousness to be impregnated with the latent impressions of the afflictions and the secondary afflictions such as desire.

original: rnam par shes pa de la rnam par shes pas bsgos par yang mi rung ngo ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa de la rnam par shes pas bsgos par yang mi rung ngo ste /
translated: It is also not possible for that consciousness to be impregnated by consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la ji ltar ba bzhin du 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa lhag ma rnams la yang ci rigs su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la ji ltar ba bzhin du 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa lhag ma rnams la yang ci rigs su rig par bya'o //
translated: The remaining forms of consciousness that engage their objects in the same way as the eye consciousness should be understood in the same way, as appropriate.

original: gang yang sa gong ma 'du shes med pa nas 'chi 'phos te /
analyzed: gang yang sa gong ma 'du shes med pa nas 'chi 'phos te /
translated: Moreover, those who die in the higher realms, the nonpercipient beings,

original: 'dir skyes pa rnams kyi rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par gyur pa thog ma nyid du skye ba de yang sa bon med par skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir skyes pa rnams kyi rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par gyur pa thog ma nyid du skye ba de yang sa bon med par skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: and are reborn here in this world, their consciousness, which is afflicted by the afflictions and the secondary afflictions, arises initially without a seed.

original: bag chags de gnas dang bcas par 'das pas med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bag chags de gnas dang bcas par 'das pas med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the latent imprints, together with their basis, have passed away.

original: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i rnam par shes pa byung na de ma yin pa gzhan 'jig rten pa'i rnam par shes pa thams cad ni 'gags na /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i rnam par shes pa byung na de ma yin pa gzhan 'jig rten pa'i rnam par shes pa thams cad ni 'gags na /
translated: If a consciousness that is an antidote to the afflictions arises, all other worldly consciousnesses that are not that have ceased.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med par gnyen po'i rnam par shes pa de ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon dang bcas par mi rung ste /
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med par gnyen po'i rnam par shes pa de ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon dang bcas par mi rung ste /
translated: If there were no storehouse consciousness, that consciousness that is an antidote could not have the seeds of the afflictions and the secondary afflictions,

original: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par grol ba dang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par grol ba dang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be essentially liberated and would not arise or cease simultaneously with the afflictions.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na /
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na /
translated: If there were no storehouse consciousness,🔽then when the active forms of consciousness arise again after that, the latent afflictions would have passed away along with their supports,

original: de'i 'og tu yang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba na bag chags de gnas dang bcas te 'das nas yun ring ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu yang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba na bag chags de gnas dang bcas te 'das nas yun ring ste /
translated: and a long time would have elapsed.

original: med pa'i phyir sa bon med pa las skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir sa bon med pa las skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, they would arise without seeds.

original: de lta bas na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de lta bas na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa mi rung ngo //
translated: Thus, if there were no storehouse consciousness, the afflicted state of the world would not be tenable.

original: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa ji ltar mi rung zhe na /
analyzed: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa ji ltar mi rung zhe na /
translated: How is the all-pervading affliction of karma not tenable?

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the condition of volitions for consciousness is not tenable.

original: de med na len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa yang ma rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa yang ma rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If that does not exist, the condition of grasping for existence is not tenable.

original: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ji ltar mi rung zhe na /
analyzed: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ji ltar mi rung zhe na /
translated: How is the all-pervading affliction of birth not tenable?

original: nyid mtshams sbyor ba sprel ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyid mtshams sbyor ba sprel ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the connection of linking is not tenable.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa nas shi 'phos pa'i yid bar ma do'i srid pa na gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa nas shi 'phos pa'i yid bar ma do'i srid pa na gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: When the mind of one who has died from the nonconcentrated stage is in the intermediate existence,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa can gyis @9a * //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa can gyis @9a * //
translated: the afflicted mental consciousness

original: nyid mtshams sbyor ba sprel te /
analyzed: nyid mtshams sbyor ba sprel te /
translated: connects with the next existence.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa can de ni bar ma do'i srid par 'gags la /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa can de ni bar ma do'i srid par 'gags la /
translated: That afflicted mental consciousness ceases in the intermediate existence,

original: rnam par shes pa yang ma'i mngal du nur nur po nyid du brgyal lo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang ma'i mngal du nur nur po nyid du brgyal lo //
translated: and consciousness enters the mother’s womb as the state of kalala.

original: gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa de nyid brgyal na ni brgyal ba de la brten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa de nyid brgyal na ni brgyal ba de la brten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: If that mental consciousness itself were to swoon, then on the basis of that swoon, the mental consciousness would enter the mother’s womb.

original: des na yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis lhan cig tu ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis lhan cig tu ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, two mental consciousnesses would enter the mother’s womb together.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa brgyal ba de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid du mi rigs te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa brgyal ba de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid du mi rigs te /
translated: That swooning mental consciousness is not reasonable as a mental consciousness.

original: dus rtag tu nyon mongs pa can gnas yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa la mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus rtag tu nyon mongs pa can gnas yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa la mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is always afflicted and because it does not focus on the object of a mental consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa de brgyal ba yin du chug na yang ci yid kyi rnam par shes pa brgyal ba de sa bon thams cad pa yin nam /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa de brgyal ba yin du chug na yang ci yid kyi rnam par shes pa brgyal ba de sa bon thams cad pa yin nam /
translated: Even if we allow that mental consciousness to swoon, is that swooning mental consciousness the universal seed?

original: 'on te gang de la brten nas zhugs pa yin /
analyzed: 'on te gang de la brten nas zhugs pa yin /
translated: Or is it that which enters the womb on the basis of that?

original: gal te gang brgyal ba de sa bon thams cad pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te gang brgyal ba de sa bon thams cad pa yin na ni /
translated: If that which swoons is the universal seed,

original: des na yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi rnam grangs kyi ming du gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: des na yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi rnam grangs kyi ming du gzhag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, what is called the mental consciousness is a synonym for the store consciousness.

original: ji ste de la brten pa sa bon thams cad pa yin na ni //
analyzed: ji ste de la brten pa sa bon thams cad pa yin na ni //
translated: If it is the support of all the seeds,

original: des na gang gnas kyi dngos pos rgyur gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa de yang sa bon thams cad pa ma yin na /
analyzed: des na gang gnas kyi dngos pos rgyur gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa de yang sa bon thams cad pa ma yin na /
translated: then the consciousness that is the cause, which is the support, is not the one that has all the seeds.

original: gang rten pa 'bras bur gyur pa de lta sa bon thams cad par rung re skan /
analyzed: gang rten pa 'bras bur gyur pa de lta sa bon thams cad par rung re skan /
translated: How could the consciousness that is the result, which is the supported, be the one that has all the seeds?

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa brgyal ba gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa brgyal ba gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the consciousness that is the support is not the mental consciousness.

original: de ni rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa ste de sa bon thams cad pa'o zhes bya ba der grub bo //
analyzed: de ni rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa ste de sa bon thams cad pa'o zhes bya ba der grub bo //
translated: It is the consciousness that is the result of maturations, and it is the one that has all the seeds.

original: nyid mtshams sbyor ba sprel zin pa rnams kyi dbang po gzugs can 'dzin par byed ba yang de las gzhan rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes par mi 'thad de /
analyzed: nyid mtshams sbyor ba sprel zin pa rnams kyi dbang po gzugs can 'dzin par byed ba yang de las gzhan rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes par mi 'thad de /
translated: The grasping of the material organs by those who have already been reborn is not tenable as the consciousness that is the result of maturations, which is different from that.

original: de ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa gzhan rnams ni gnas so sor nges pa dang mi brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa gzhan rnams ni gnas so sor nges pa dang mi brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The other consciousnesses do not have a fixed location, nor do they have a support.

original: rnam par shes pa med pa'i dbang po gzugs can ni mi rung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa'i dbang po gzugs can ni mi rung ngo //
translated: It is not possible for a physical sense faculty to be without consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs mdung khyim ltar gcig la gcig brten pa'i tshul gyis 'dug pa gang yin pa de yang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs mdung khyim ltar gcig la gcig brten pa'i tshul gyis 'dug pa gang yin pa de yang /
translated: Name-and-form and consciousness are like a bundle of reeds, mutually supporting each other.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na ri rung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na ri rung ngo //
translated: This is not possible without the consciousness that is the result of maturation.

original: rnam par shes pa gzhan ni sems can @9b 'byung po rnams kyi zas su yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gzhan ni sems can @9b 'byung po rnams kyi zas su yang mi rung ste /
translated: The other consciousnesses are not suitable to be food for the beings of the three realms.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na /
translated: Without the consciousness that is the result of maturation,

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa drug po rnams las gang yang rung bas /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa drug po rnams las gang yang rung bas /
translated: it is not possible for any of the six consciousnesses that are the results of maturation

original: khams gsum pa'i sems can 'byung po rnams kyi zas byed pa ni mi dmigs so //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i sems can 'byung po rnams kyi zas byed pa ni mi dmigs so //
translated: to be the food of the beings of the three realms.

original: 'di nas shi 'phos te mnyam par gzhag pa'i sar skye ba na /
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos te mnyam par gzhag pa'i sar skye ba na /
translated: When beings die here and are reborn in the realm of meditative stability,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa can mnyam par ma bzhag pas nyid mtshams sbyor zhing sprel ba yang rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa can mnyam par ma bzhag pas nyid mtshams sbyor zhing sprel ba yang rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na /
translated: The afflicted mental consciousness that is not in equipoise links with and connects to the other consciousnesses.

original: de'i sa bon mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems nyon mongs pa can gyi sa bon dang ldan pa gzhan de mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i sa bon mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems nyon mongs pa can gyi sa bon dang ldan pa gzhan de mi 'thad do //
translated: If the consciousness that is the ripening of karma does not exist, then it is untenable that the seeds of the afflicted mind that is not in equipoise possess the seeds of the afflicted mind.

original: yang gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi dge ba'i sems yod pa rnams la nyon mongs pa can gyi dge ba'i sems kyang /
analyzed: yang gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi dge ba'i sems yod pa rnams la nyon mongs pa can gyi dge ba'i sems kyang /
translated: Moreover, in the formless realm, the afflicted virtuous mind that exists in the formless realm

original: sa bon thams cad rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na /
analyzed: sa bon thams cad rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na /
translated: would have no seeds of the afflicted mind if the consciousness that is the ripening of karma did not exist.

original: sa bon med cing gzhi med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa bon med cing gzhi med par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be without seeds and without a basis.

original: de nyid na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems mngon par byed pa'i tshe de ma yin pa gzhan 'jig rten pa'i sems med par 'gyur bas de'i 'gro ba ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems mngon par byed pa'i tshe de ma yin pa gzhan 'jig rten pa'i sems med par 'gyur bas de'i 'gro ba ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, when the supramundane mind manifests in that realm, the mundane mind that is other than that would not exist. Therefore, the movement of beings would cease.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skyes pa rnams kyang ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems mngon du byed pa na /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skyes pa rnams kyang ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems mngon du byed pa na /
translated: Also, those born in the base of neither discernment nor nondiscernment manifest a supramundane mind of the base of nothingness.

original: de dag gi 'gro ba gnyi ga ldog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag gi 'gro ba gnyi ga ldog par 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, both of their migrations cease.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa de'i gnas ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa de'i gnas ni /
translated: The basis of that supramundane consciousness

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skyes mched kyi 'gro ba yang ma yin zhing ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 'gro ba yang gnas ma yin la /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skyes mched kyi 'gro ba yang ma yin zhing ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 'gro ba yang gnas ma yin la /
translated: is not the migration of the base of neither discernment nor nondiscernment, nor is it the migration of the base of nothingness,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'gro ba yang gnas su mi rung ngo //🔽legs par bya ba byed pa'am /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'gro ba yang gnas su mi rung ngo // legs par bya ba byed pa'am /
translated: nor is it suitable to be the migration of nirvana.

original: nyes par bya ba byed pa 'chi 'pho ba na lus smad dam stod nas rim gyis drod yal bar 'gyur ba yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ste /
analyzed: nyes par bya ba byed pa 'chi 'pho ba na lus smad dam stod nas rim gyis drod yal bar 'gyur ba yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ste /
translated: When one who has done good or done evil dies and transmigrates, the heat of the body gradually dissipates from the lower or upper parts of the body, respectively. This is not possible without the foundation consciousness.

original: de lta bas na skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yang sa bon thams cad pa rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de lta bas na skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yang sa bon thams cad pa rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ngo //
translated: Thus, the afflicted state of birth is not possible without the fruitional consciousness that contains all the seeds.

original: ji ltar na 'jig rten pa'i rnam par byang ba yang mi rung zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'jig rten pa'i rnam par byang ba yang mi rung zhe na /
translated: How is the mundane purified state not possible?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gzugs na spyod pa'i sems ma thob pas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems nyid kyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang @10a * //🔽bral bar bya ba'i phyir rab tu sbyor ba na /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gzugs na spyod pa'i sems ma thob pas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems nyid kyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang @10a * // bral bar bya ba'i phyir rab tu sbyor ba na /
translated: Thus, one who is not free from attachment to the desire realm but has not attained the mind of the form realm applies himself to freedom from attachment to the desire realm through the mind of virtuous equipoise of the desire realm.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems de yang gzugs na spyod pa'i sems dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir des bsgos pa med pas de sa bon du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems de yang gzugs na spyod pa'i sems dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir des bsgos pa med pas de sa bon du mi rung ngo //
translated: Since that mind of equipoise of the desire realm does not arise and cease simultaneously with the mind of the form realm, it is not imbued with it, and thus it is not its seed.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i sems 'das pa tshe rabs du mar sems gzhan gyis bar du bcad pa de yang med pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems de'i sa bon nyid du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i sems 'das pa tshe rabs du mar sems gzhan gyis bar du bcad pa de yang med pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems de'i sa bon nyid du mi rung ngo //
translated: Also, the past mind that experiences the form realm is not the seed of that concentrated mind, because it is interrupted by other minds in many lifetimes.

original: de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid kyi sa bon thams cad la yang ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid kyi sa bon thams cad la yang ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the seed of all the stages of detachment should be applied in the appropriate manner.

original: de lta bas na gang sa bon thams cad pa rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'ongs pa de ni gzugs na spyod pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems de'i rgyu'i rkyen yin la /
analyzed: de lta bas na gang sa bon thams cad pa rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'ongs pa de ni gzugs na spyod pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems de'i rgyu'i rkyen yin la /
translated: Therefore, the cause of that concentrated mind that experiences the form realm is the consciousness that is the ripening of all the seeds, which has come down from beginningless time.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i sems de ni bdag po'i rkyen yin par de grub bo //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i sems de ni bdag po'i rkyen yin par de grub bo //
translated: The virtuous mind that arises from practice is its dominant condition.

original: de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba yang sa bon thams cad pa rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba yang sa bon thams cad pa rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ste /
translated: In the same way, supramundane purification is not possible without the consciousness that is the ripening of all the seeds.

original: ji ltar na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba mi rung zhe na /🔽gzhan gyi sgra la brten pa dang so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brten nas /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba mi rung zhe na / gzhan gyi sgra la brten pa dang so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brten nas /
translated: How is it that the transcendence of suffering is not tenable?

original: de'i rgyu las yang dag pa'i lta ba 'byung ngo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽gzhan gyi sgra las yid la byed pa des rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: de'i rgyu las yang dag pa'i lta ba 'byung ngo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / gzhan gyi sgra las yid la byed pa des rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: The Bhagavān has said, “The correct view arises from the cause of listening to the words of others and from the cause of proper mental attention.”🔽From the mental attention that is based on the words of others,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: is it the ear consciousness or the mental consciousness

original: de gnyi ga la bag chags su bsgos par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: de gnyi ga la bag chags su bsgos par 'gyur grang na /
translated: or both of those that the latent propensities are infused?

original: de la chos de dag tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni re zhig mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de la chos de dag tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni re zhig mi 'byung ngo //
translated: When those phenomena are properly attended to, the ear consciousness does not occur.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa rnam par g-yeng bas bar du chod la /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa rnam par g-yeng bas bar du chod la /
translated: The mental consciousness is interrupted by the distraction of other consciousnesses.

original: gang gi tshe tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems byung ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems byung ba de'i tshe /
translated: When the mind that is concomitant with proper mental attention arises,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa thos pa'i bag chags bsgos pa de ni bag chags dang bcas te 'gags shing 'das nas yun ring du lon te med na /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa thos pa'i bag chags bsgos pa de ni bag chags dang bcas te 'gags shing 'das nas yun ring du lon te med na /
translated: The mental consciousness that is imbued with the imprints of hearing ceases and passes away long ago, and does not exist.

original: phyis de'i sa bon can tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems gang las 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: phyis de'i sa bon can tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems gang las 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: How then could the later mind that possesses its seeds arise from that?

original: gang yang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'jig rten pa'i sems de ni /
analyzed: gang yang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'jig rten pa'i sems de ni /
translated: Moreover, the mundane mind that is concomitant with proper mental attention

original: yang dag @10b pa'i lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems dang nam yang lhan cig tu skyes pa dang 'gag pa med de /
analyzed: yang dag @10b pa'i lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems dang nam yang lhan cig tu skyes pa dang 'gag pa med de /
translated: is never born or ceases simultaneously with the supramundane mind that is concomitant with the correct view.

original: de'i phyir des bsgos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir des bsgos pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not imbued with that.

original: ma bsgos pa'i phyir sa bon du mi rung ste /
analyzed: ma bsgos pa'i phyir sa bon du mi rung ste /
translated: Because it is not imbued, it is not a seed.

original: de lta bas na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba yang sa bon thams cad pa rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba yang sa bon thams cad pa rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ste /
translated: Therefore, supramundane purification is not possible without the consciousness that is the ripening of all the seeds.

original: de la thos pa'i bag chags kyis ni de'i sa bon yongs su 'dzin par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la thos pa'i bag chags kyis ni de'i sa bon yongs su 'dzin par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, it is not reasonable that the latent impressions of listening would hold the seeds of that.

original: sa bon thams cad pa rnam par shes pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin na de'i gnyen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems kyi sa bon du ji ltar rung /
analyzed: sa bon thams cad pa rnam par shes pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin na de'i gnyen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems kyi sa bon du ji ltar rung /
translated: If the consciousness that has all the seeds is the cause of affliction, how could it be reasonable that it is the seed of the supramundane mind, which is its antidote?

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems ni ma 'dres pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems ni ma 'dres pa ste /
translated: The supramundane mind is unmixed.

original: de bas na de'i bag chags ni med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na de'i bag chags ni med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it does not have latent impressions.

original: bag chags de med na sa bon gang las 'byung ba brjod dgos so zhe na /
analyzed: bag chags de med na sa bon gang las 'byung ba brjod dgos so zhe na /
translated: If it does not have those latent impressions, you must say what the seed of that is.

original: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa thos pa'i bag chags sa bon las de 'byung ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa thos pa'i bag chags sa bon las de 'byung ngo //
translated: It arises from the seed of the latent impressions of listening, which is the natural outflow of the extremely pure dharmadhātu.

original: thos pa'i bag chags gang yin pa de yang ci kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin nam /
analyzed: thos pa'i bag chags gang yin pa de yang ci kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin nam /
translated: Are those latent impressions of listening the nature of the store consciousness?

original: gal te kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na ni /
translated: If they are the nature of the store consciousness,

original: ji ltar de'i gnyen po'i sa bon du rung /
analyzed: ji ltar de'i gnyen po'i sa bon du rung /
translated: how could they be reasonable as the seed of its antidote?

original: ji ste de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na ni des na thos pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon de'i gnas ci zhig yin par blta zhe na /
analyzed: ji ste de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na ni des na thos pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon de'i gnas ci zhig yin par blta zhe na /
translated: If it is not the nature of that, then what is the basis of the seed of the latent impressions of hearing?

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub la brten nas thos pa'i bag chags su gyur pa gang yin pa gnas gang la 'jug pa de lhan cig 'dug pa'i tshul gyis rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa la 'jug ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub la brten nas thos pa'i bag chags su gyur pa gang yin pa gnas gang la 'jug pa de lhan cig 'dug pa'i tshul gyis rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa la 'jug ste /
translated: That which is the latent impression of hearing in dependence on the enlightenment of the buddhas is the basis that enters into the fruitional consciousness in the manner of co-existence.

original: 'o ma dang chu bzhin no //
analyzed: 'o ma dang chu bzhin no //
translated: It is like milk and water.

original: de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not the foundation consciousness,

original: de'i gnyen po'i sa bon nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i gnyen po'i sa bon nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the seed of the antidote to that.

original: de la bag chags chung ngu la brten nas bag chags 'bring por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la bag chags chung ngu la brten nas bag chags 'bring por 'gyur ro //
translated: In that regard, based on small latent impressions, medium latent impressions occur.

original: bag chags 'bring po la brten nas bag chags chen por 'gyur te /
analyzed: bag chags 'bring po la brten nas bag chags chen por 'gyur te /
translated: Based on medium latent impressions, great latent impressions occur.

original: thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa lan mang du bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa lan mang du bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the frequent occurrence of hearing, reflection, and meditation.

original: de la thos pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon chung ngu dang 'bring po dang chen po yang chos kyi sku'i sa bon du blta ste /
analyzed: de la thos pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon chung ngu dang 'bring po dang chen po yang chos kyi sku'i sa bon du blta ste /
translated: The seeds of the traces of hearing, whether small, middling, or great, should be seen as seeds of the body of the Dharma.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i gnyen po yin pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten pa yin yang 'jig rten las @11a * //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i gnyen po yin pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten pa yin yang 'jig rten las @11a * //
translated: Since it is the antidote to the consciousness of the ground of all, it is not of the nature of the consciousness of the ground of all.

original: 'das pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa yin pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems kyi sa bon du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa yin pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems kyi sa bon du gyur pa'o //
translated: Although it is mundane, it is the seed of the supramundane mind, since it is the natural outflow of the extremely pure realm of phenomena.

original: 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems ma byung du zin kyang nyon mongs pas kun nas dkris pa'i gnyen po dang / ngan song du 'gro ba'i gnyen po dang / nyes par byas pa thams cad de nges par byed pa'i gnyen po yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems ma byung du zin kyang nyon mongs pas kun nas dkris pa'i gnyen po dang / ngan song du 'gro ba'i gnyen po dang / nyes par byas pa thams cad de nges par byed pa'i gnyen po yin no //
translated: Even though the supramundane mind has not yet arisen, it is the antidote to the entanglements of the afflictions, the antidote to going to the lower realms, and the antidote to all misdeeds.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad pa'i rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad pa'i rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: It is in accord with meeting the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa yin yang chos kyi skur bsdus pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus su bsdus par yang blta'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa yin yang chos kyi skur bsdus pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus su bsdus par yang blta'o //
translated: The body of the bodhisattva who is a beginner is included in the Dharma body, even though it is worldly, and it is also included in the body of liberation of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not the container consciousness.

original: chos kyi sku dang rnam par grol ba'i lus su bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi sku dang rnam par grol ba'i lus su bsdus pa ste /
translated: It is included in the Dharma body and the body of liberation.

original: chung ngu dang 'bring po dang chen po ji lta ji lta bur rim gyis 'phel ba de lta de lta bur rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa yang 'bri zhing gnas kyang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chung ngu dang 'bring po dang chen po ji lta ji lta bur rim gyis 'phel ba de lta de lta bur rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa yang 'bri zhing gnas kyang 'gyur ro //
translated: To the extent that it gradually increases in small, middling, and great stages, to that extent the consciousness that is the result of maturation decreases and the basis changes.

original: gnas rnam pa thams cad du gyur na rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa sa bon thams cad pa yang sa bon med par gyur pa dang rnam par thams cad du spangs pa yang yin no //
analyzed: gnas rnam pa thams cad du gyur na rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa sa bon thams cad pa yang sa bon med par gyur pa dang rnam par thams cad du spangs pa yang yin no //
translated: When the basis has changed in every respect, the consciousness that is the result of maturation, which contains all the seeds, becomes seedless and is completely abandoned.

original: ji ltar na yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa chud dang 'o ma bzhin du lhan cig tu gnas pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du 'grib par 'gyur zhe na /🔽ngang pas chu las 'o ma 'thungs pa lta bu dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba na /
analyzed: ji ltar na yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa chud dang 'o ma bzhin du lhan cig tu gnas pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du 'grib par 'gyur zhe na / ngang pas chu las 'o ma 'thungs pa lta bu dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba na /
translated: How could the foundation consciousness and that which is not the foundation consciousness, like water and milk, remain together and yet the latter gradually diminish?🔽It is like the way that swans drink milk from water.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i sa'i bag chags 'grib ste /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i sa'i bag chags 'grib ste /
translated: When one is free from worldly attachment, the latent tendencies of the stage of non-equipoise diminish,

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa'i bag chags 'phel nas gnas gyur pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa'i bag chags 'phel nas gnas gyur pa bzhin no //
translated: and the latent tendencies of the stage of equipoise increase and transform.

original: 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par shes pa dang mi 'bral lo zhes gsungs pa'i yang phyir de ni rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang ma bral bar rigs te /
analyzed: 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par shes pa dang mi 'bral lo zhes gsungs pa'i yang phyir de ni rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang ma bral bar rigs te /
translated: Also, it is said that those who enter the absorption of cessation do not lose consciousness, and therefore it is reasonable that they do not lose the consciousness that is the result of karma.

original: de'i gnyen por 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i gnyen por 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The absorption of cessation is not the antidote that eliminates that consciousness.

original: de las langs pa rnams kyi gdod 'byung ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de las langs pa rnams kyi gdod 'byung ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not the case that it arises anew when one arises from that absorption.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa rgyun chad nas nyid mtshams sbyor ba ma gtogs par gzhan du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa rgyun chad nas nyid mtshams sbyor ba ma gtogs par gzhan du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not occur elsewhere except when the maturational consciousness is interrupted and it is being reconnected.

original: gang yang 'gog @11b pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod pas sems dang bcas pa snyam du sems pa de'i ltar na yang sems de mi rung ste /
analyzed: gang yang 'gog @11b pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod pas sems dang bcas pa snyam du sems pa de'i ltar na yang sems de mi rung ste /
translated: Also, if you think that the meditative attainment of cessation has a mental consciousness and therefore has mind, then that mind is not tenable because

original: snyoms par 'jug pa mi rung ba'i phyir dang / dmigs pa dang rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir dang / mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan par mi rigs pas /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa mi rung ba'i phyir dang / dmigs pa dang rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir dang / mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan par mi rigs pas /
translated: it is untenable that meditative attainment has mind because it is not tenable that it is virtuous or nonvirtuous or neutral,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / reg pa dmigs pas 'du shes pa dang tshor ba kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / 'du shes rgyun chad pa tsam du 'gyur bas de'i mthus mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / reg pa dmigs pas 'du shes pa dang tshor ba kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / 'du shes rgyun chad pa tsam du 'gyur bas de'i mthus mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
translated: because it would be concomitant with the roots of virtue, because it would be the occurrence of discernment and feeling due to the observation of contact, because it would be the mere cessation of discernment, and because it would be equipoise due to its power.

original: sems pa dang dad pa la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / rten las brten pa dbyer mi rung ba'i phyir dang / dpe yod pa'i phyir dang / kun tu 'gro ba nyid yin pa las de bzhin du med pa'i phyir ro //🔽dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan par mi 'thad pa'i phyir de yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: sems pa dang dad pa la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / rten las brten pa dbyer mi rung ba'i phyir dang / dpe yod pa'i phyir dang / kun tu 'gro ba nyid yin pa las de bzhin du med pa'i phyir ro // dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan par mi 'thad pa'i phyir de yang mi rung ngo //
translated: It is also not tenable that the mind is the seed of the mental factors, because virtue, nonvirtue, and neutral states are not tenable.🔽Also, it is not tenable that the mind is the seed of all phenomena that arise subsequent to form and mind, because it is not tenable that it is the seed of form, and it is not tenable that it is the seed of the mental factors.🔽It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of form, because it is not tenable that form is virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.🔽It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of the mental factors, because it is not tenable that the mental factors are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.🔽It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of the mental factors, because it is not tenable that the mental factors are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.

original: gang yang gzugs dang sems kyi mjug thogs su 'byung ba chos rnams kyi sa bon nyid du rtog pa de'i yang gong ma bzhin du mi 'thad kyis steng du gzugs med pa dang 'du shes med pa nas shi 'phos pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs pa'i de yang mi rung ngo /
analyzed: gang yang gzugs dang sems kyi mjug thogs su 'byung ba chos rnams kyi sa bon nyid du rtog pa de'i yang gong ma bzhin du mi 'thad kyis steng du gzugs med pa dang 'du shes med pa nas shi 'phos pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs pa'i de yang mi rung ngo /
translated: It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of the mental factors, because it is not tenable that the mental factors are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.🔽It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of the mental factors, because it is not tenable that the mental factors are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.🔽It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of the mental factors, because it is not tenable that the mental factors are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.🔽It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of the mental factors, because it is not tenable that the mental factors are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.🔽It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of the mental factors, because it is not tenable that the mental factors are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.🔽It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of the mental factors, because it is not tenable that the mental factors are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.🔽It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of the mental factors, because it is not tenable that the mental factors are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.

original: de ma thag pa'i rkyen nyid du rung ba ma gtogs par dgra bcom pa'i tha ma'i sems kyang mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rkyen nyid du rung ba ma gtogs par dgra bcom pa'i tha ma'i sems kyang mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not tenable that the mind is the seed of

original: de ltar na sa bon thams cad ba rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar na sa bon thams cad ba rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa med na kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mi rung ngo //
translated: Thus, if there were no consciousness as retribution containing all seeds, then defilement and purification would be impossible.

original: de lta bas na de yod pa nyid dang / ji ltar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyang 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bas na de yod pa nyid dang / ji ltar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyang 'grub bo //
translated: Therefore, it exists, and the characteristics explained above are established.

original: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa /
analyzed: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa /
translated: Here is a verse:

original: byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i sems //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i sems //
translated: The good mind of the bodhisattva

original: rnam par shes pa lnga spangs pa //🔽bstsal ba de las gzhan pa la //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa lnga spangs pa // bstsal ba de las gzhan pa la //
translated: is abandoned by the five consciousnesses.

original: sems ni ji ltar 'gyur bar byed //
analyzed: sems ni ji ltar 'gyur bar byed //
translated: How can the mind be transformed🔽from that which is abandoned to that which is not?

original: gnyen po gyur ba yin zhes byar //
analyzed: gnyen po gyur ba yin zhes byar //
translated: It is not reasonable to say that it is transformed into an antidote

original: spangs pa min phyir mi rung ngo //
analyzed: spangs pa min phyir mi rung ngo //
translated: because it is not abandoned.

original: de ni spangs pa yin na yang //
analyzed: de ni spangs pa yin na yang //
translated: Even if it were abandoned,

original: rgyu 'bras tha dad med par 'gyur //🔽gal te sa bon bral ba'am //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras tha dad med par 'gyur // gal te sa bon bral ba'am //
translated: cause and effect would not be different.🔽If you assert that it becomes free from seeds

original: dngos po med par 'gyur 'dod na //
analyzed: dngos po med par 'gyur 'dod na //
translated: or non-existent,

original: de med par ni gnyis med de //
analyzed: de med par ni gnyis med de //
translated: then without it, the two would not exist,

original: 'gyur ba rung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ba rung ba ma yin no //
translated: and transformation would not be possible.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'di'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'di'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is the classification of this consciousness as the container?

original: mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum @12a * //
analyzed: mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum @12a * //
translated: In brief, it should be understood as threefold

original: dang rnam pa bzhir blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dang rnam pa bzhir blta bar bya'o //
translated: and as fourfold.

original: de la bag chags rnam pa gsum gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de la bag chags rnam pa gsum gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Therein, it is threefold by way of the differentiation of the three kinds of residual impressions:

original: mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag dang / bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags kyi bye brag dang / srid pa'i yan lag gi bag chags kyi bye brag gis so //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag dang / bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags kyi bye brag dang / srid pa'i yan lag gi bag chags kyi bye brag gis so //
translated: the differentiation of the residual impressions of verbal expression, the differentiation of the residual impressions of the view of self, and the differentiation of the residual impressions of the members of existence.

original: rnam pa bzhi ni 'phen pas rab tu dbye ba dang / rnam par smin pas rab tu dbye ba dang / rgyu nyid du rab tu dbye ba dang / mtshan nyid kho nas rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi ni 'phen pas rab tu dbye ba dang / rnam par smin pas rab tu dbye ba dang / rgyu nyid du rab tu dbye ba dang / mtshan nyid kho nas rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: It is fourfold by way of the differentiation of projection, the differentiation of fruition, the differentiation of cause, and the differentiation of characteristic.

original: de la 'phen pas rab tu dbye ba ni gang rnam par smin pa'i bag chags gsar du 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de la 'phen pas rab tu dbye ba ni gang rnam par smin pa'i bag chags gsar du 'byung ba ste /
translated: Therein, the differentiation of projection is the new arising of the residual impressions of fruition.

original: de med du zin na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam pa shes pa dang / len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de med du zin na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam pa shes pa dang / len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa mi rung ngo //
translated: If that did not exist, then consciousness as a condition of the formative forces and existence as a condition of grasping would be untenable.

original: de la rnam par smin pas rab tu dbye ba ni gang 'du byed dang srid pa'i rkyen gyis 'gro ba rnams su rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pas rab tu dbye ba ni gang 'du byed dang srid pa'i rkyen gyis 'gro ba rnams su rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The classification by way of fruitions is that which is the fruitions in the various migrations through the conditions of compositional activity and existence.

original: de med du zin na sa bon med pas yang 'byung ba'i chos rnams skye bar mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de med du zin na sa bon med pas yang 'byung ba'i chos rnams skye bar mi rung ngo //
translated: If that did not exist, then without a seed, the arising of the phenomena of rebirth would be impossible.

original: de la rgyu nyid du rab tu dbye ba ni gang de nyid la yid kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rgyu nyid de de med du zin na yid kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dmigs pa mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de la rgyu nyid du rab tu dbye ba ni gang de nyid la yid kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rgyu nyid de de med du zin na yid kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dmigs pa mi rung ngo //
translated: The classification by way of cause is that which is the cause of the mind apprehending a self in that very selflessness. If that did not exist, then the object of the mind apprehending a self would be impossible.

original: de la mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba ni /
analyzed: de la mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba ni /
translated: The classification by way of characteristics is

original: gang de nyid kyi thun mong gi mtshan nyid dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba med pa 'byung ba'i sa bon gyi mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i sa bon gyi mtshan nyid de thun mong ni snod kyi 'jig rten gyi sa bon gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang de nyid kyi thun mong gi mtshan nyid dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba med pa 'byung ba'i sa bon gyi mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i sa bon gyi mtshan nyid de thun mong ni snod kyi 'jig rten gyi sa bon gang yin pa'o //
translated: the common characteristics of that very selflessness, the uncommon characteristics of that very selflessness, the characteristics of the seed of the arising of that which is without feeling, and the characteristics of the seed of the arising of that which is with feeling. The common characteristics are the seeds of the physical world.

original: thun mong ma yin pa de ni so so rang gi skye mched kyi sa bon gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa de ni so so rang gi skye mched kyi sa bon gang yin pa'o //
translated: The uncommon seed is that of the individual sense bases.

original: thun mong gang yin pa de ni tshor ba med pa 'byung ba'i sa bon no //
analyzed: thun mong gang yin pa de ni tshor ba med pa 'byung ba'i sa bon no //
translated: The common seed is that of the arising of the insensate elements.

original: gnyen po byung na thun mong ma yin pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag go //
analyzed: gnyen po byung na thun mong ma yin pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag go //
translated: When the antidote arises, the uncommon is the opposing side.

original: thun mong pa gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pas yongs su zin pa la ni mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: thun mong pa gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pas yongs su zin pa la ni mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur te /
translated: The common is the pure vision that is embraced by the conceptions of others.

original: rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi mos pa tha dad pas dngos po gcig la blta bar bya ba tha dad pa dmigs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi mos pa tha dad pas dngos po gcig la blta bar bya ba tha dad pa dmigs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the different objects that are observed by yogis who have different interests in a single thing.

original: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa //
analyzed: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa //
translated: Here is a verse:🔽The common is said to be difficult to abandon,

original: thun mong 'ching ba spang dka' dang // yongs shes bya bar dka' bar 'dod //
analyzed: thun mong 'ching ba spang dka' dang // yongs shes bya bar dka' bar 'dod //
translated: and the thoroughly known is difficult to do.

original: phyi rol mtshan ma chen po las //
analyzed: phyi rol mtshan ma chen po las //
translated: From the great external signs,

original: rnal 'byor ba yi tha dad sems //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba yi tha dad sems //
translated: the yogis have different minds.

original: de ni 'gags par ma gyur kyang //🔽dag pa rnams kyi mthong ba dag //
analyzed: de ni 'gags par ma gyur kyang // dag pa rnams kyi mthong ba dag //
translated: Even though that is not stopped,🔽the pure vision of the pure

original: sangs rgyas gzigs pa rnam dag phyir //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzigs pa rnam dag phyir //
translated: is the pure vision of the buddhas.

original: sangs @12b rgyas zhing ni rnam par dag //
analyzed: sangs @12b rgyas zhing ni rnam par dag //
translated: The Buddha-field is pure.

original: thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshor ba dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i sa bon te /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshor ba dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i sa bon te /
translated: The seeds of the arising of that which is not common are the seeds of the arising of that which is common.

original: de med du zin na snod kyi 'jig rten dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten 'byung ba'i bye brag mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de med du zin na snod kyi 'jig rten dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten 'byung ba'i bye brag mi rung ngo //
translated: If they did not exist, the distinction between the physical world and the world of sentient beings would be impossible.

original: yang gnas ngan len gyi mtshan nyid dang / shin tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: yang gnas ngan len gyi mtshan nyid dang / shin tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Moreover, there is the characteristic of negative reflex action and the characteristic of positive reflex action.

original: gnas ngan len gyi mtshan nyid ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gnas ngan len gyi mtshan nyid ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon gang yin pa'o //
translated: The characteristic of negative reflex action is the seed of the fundamental and proximate defilements.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gang yin pa ste /
translated: The characteristic of positive reflex action is the seed of the good, impure dharmas.

original: de med du zin na rnam par smin pas gnas kyi las su mi rung ba dang / las su rung ba'i bye brag mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de med du zin na rnam par smin pas gnas kyi las su mi rung ba dang / las su rung ba'i bye brag mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If they did not exist, the distinction between the karma of the receptacle world and the karma of the world of sentient beings would be impossible.🔽Moreover, there is the characteristic of the seed of the arising of the world of sentient beings and the characteristic of the seed of the arising of the physical world.

original: yang spyad zin pa dang / ma spyad pa'i mtshan nyid de spyad zin pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sa bon gyi rnam par smin pa rnam par smin zin pa'o //
analyzed: yang spyad zin pa dang / ma spyad pa'i mtshan nyid de spyad zin pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sa bon gyi rnam par smin pa rnam par smin zin pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the characteristic of what has already been experienced and what has not yet been experienced. The characteristic of what has already been experienced is that the maturation of the seeds of virtue and nonvirtue has already matured.

original: ma spyad pa'i mtshan nyid ni mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon te /
analyzed: ma spyad pa'i mtshan nyid ni mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon te /
translated: The characteristic of what has not yet been experienced is the seed of the latent impressions of verbalization.

original: thog ma med pa'i dus nas spros pa 'byung ba'i sa bon yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i dus nas spros pa 'byung ba'i sa bon yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the seed of the arising of verbal proliferation since beginningless time.

original: de med du zin na dge ba dang sdig pa'i las byas shing byas pa 'bras bu 'byin pas spyad zin pa yang mi rung la /
analyzed: de med du zin na dge ba dang sdig pa'i las byas shing byas pa 'bras bu 'byin pas spyad zin pa yang mi rung la /
translated: If it did not exist, then the experience of the results of virtuous and nonvirtuous karma that have already been performed would be impossible.

original: mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags gsar du 'byung ba yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags gsar du 'byung ba yang mi rung ngo //
translated: And the arising of new latent impressions of verbalization would be impossible.

original: yang na dpe'i mtshan nyid ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang rmi lam dang rab rib lta bu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na dpe'i mtshan nyid ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang rmi lam dang rab rib lta bu'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, the characteristic of the example is that the storehouse consciousness is like an illusion, a mirage, a dream, and a visual aberration.

original: de med du zin na yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'i sa bon gyis phyin ci log gi rgyu nyid du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de med du zin na yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'i sa bon gyis phyin ci log gi rgyu nyid du mi rung ngo //
translated: If it did not exist, the seed of the imagination of what is unreal would not be tenable as the cause of error.

original: yang mtha' dag nyid dang / mtha' dag nyid ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: yang mtha' dag nyid dang / mtha' dag nyid ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: Moreover, it has the characteristic of being both complete and incomplete.

original: bcings pa mtha' dag dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni mtha' dag nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: bcings pa mtha' dag dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni mtha' dag nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: It has the characteristic of being complete for those who are completely bound.

original: 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi ni nyams par byas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi ni nyams par byas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It has the characteristic of being incomplete for those who are free from worldly attachment.

original: nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' slob pa rnams kyi ni phyogs gcig bton pa'i mtshan nyid do //🔽dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa mtha' dag bton pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' slob pa rnams kyi ni phyogs gcig bton pa'i mtshan nyid do // dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa mtha' dag bton pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It has the characteristic of being partially eliminated for the śrāvakas and bodhisattvas in training.🔽It has the characteristic of being completely eliminated in terms of the afflictive obstructions for the arhats, pratyekabuddhas, and tathāgatas.

original: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa mtha' dag bton pa'i mtshan nyid de ci rigs su sbyar ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa mtha' dag bton pa'i mtshan nyid de ci rigs su sbyar ro //
translated: It has the characteristic of being completely eliminated in terms of both the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience for the tathāgatas.

original: de med du zin na kun nas nyon mongs pa rim gyis ldog par mi rung ngo //🔽ci'i phyir dge ba dang mi @13a * //
analyzed: de med du zin na kun nas nyon mongs pa rim gyis ldog par mi rung ngo // ci'i phyir dge ba dang mi @13a * //
translated: If that were not so, then the complete afflictions would not be able to cease gradually.

original: dge ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is the maturation of wholesome and unwholesome dharmas called the maturation of the unobscured-indeterminate?

original: 'di ltar ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang 'gal ba med de /
analyzed: 'di ltar ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang 'gal ba med de /
translated: Because the unobscured-indeterminate is not incompatible with the wholesome and the unwholesome.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba ni phan tshun mi mthun no //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba ni phan tshun mi mthun no //
translated: The wholesome and the unwholesome are mutually incompatible.

original: rnam par smin pa yang dge ba dang mi dge bar 'gyur na ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ldog par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa yang dge ba dang mi dge bar 'gyur na ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ldog par mi rung ngo //
translated: If the maturation were wholesome or unwholesome, then the complete afflictions would not be able to cease.

original: de lta bas na rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa nyid do //🔽shes bya'i gnas bshad zin to /
analyzed: de lta bas na rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa nyid do // shes bya'i gnas bshad zin to /
translated: Therefore, the maturation consciousness is only unobscured-indeterminate.

original: // / bam po gnyis pa /
analyzed: // / bam po gnyis pa /
translated: The topic of the bases of cognition has been explained.

original: shes bya'i mtshan nyid ji ltar blta bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: shes bya'i mtshan nyid ji ltar blta bar bya zhe na /
translated: What is the characteristic of the object of cognition?

original: de ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: In brief, it is of three kinds:

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang / kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang / kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: the characteristic of the fulfilled.

original: de la gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the characteristic of the other-dependent?

original: gang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i sa bon can yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pas bsdus pa'i rnam par rig pa'o //
analyzed: gang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i sa bon can yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pas bsdus pa'i rnam par rig pa'o //
translated: It is the representation that is included in unreal imagination, which has the seeds in the store consciousness.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: lus dang lus can dang / zab po'i rnam par rig pa dang / des nye bar spyad par bya ba'i rnam par rig pa dang / de la nye bar spyod pa'i rnam par rig pa dang / dus kyi rnam par rig pa dang / grangs kyi rnam par rig pa dang /
